text: Avesnes-le-Comte () is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A small farming town located 11 miles (17 km) west of Arras at the junction of the D8, D75 and D339 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The motte of a 12th-century castle. * The church of St. Nicholas, with the apse dating from the twelfth century. * The town hall, built in 1830. * An ancient cemetery. * The war memorial. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de- Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Avesnes-le-Comte
